Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
  Vertex

public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to represent Vertices in the PURGES Evacuation Simulator. It is not general purpose and it is not designed as a general purpose representation.

See Also:
Graph

zin - Real world z-coordinate for Vertex.
blockedin - Whether Vertex is defaultly blocked.

equals

public boolean equals(Vertex vin)
Test if two Vertex objects represent the same real world point.

Parameters:
vin - The Vertex to test equality with.
Returns:
True if Vertices are equal, false otherwise.

Deep copy a Vertex object.

Parameters:

getConnectors

public java.util.ArrayList getConnectors()
Return the ArrayList of all Verices reachable from this one (this is a shallow return, not a deep copy).

Returns:
The ArrayList of all Vertices reachable from this one.

getPathCopy

public java.util.ArrayList getPathCopy()
Return the ArrayList of the best path so far leading to this one. This method is used in the a* algorithm of the Graph class. This is a deep copy.

Returns:
The ArrayList of the current best path.

Graph

Parameters:

addPath

public void addPath(java.util.ArrayList pathin)
Add an ArrayList containing more path Vertices to the current list. This method is used in the a* algorithm of the Graph class. This is currently never used.

Parameters:
pathin - The ArrayList of new path Vertices.
See Also:
Graph

setConnectors

public void setConnectors(java.util.ArrayList connsin)
Replace the current Vertices reachable from this one with those in the given ArrayList.

Parameters:
connsin - The ArrayList of new Vertices reachable from this one.

setPath

public void setPath(java.util.ArrayList pathin)
Replace the current Path with those in the given ArrayList. This method is used in the a* algorithm of the Graph class. I don't think this is currently used.

Parameters:
pathin - The ArrayList of new Vertices reachable from this one.

isBlocked

public boolean isBlocked()
Return true if this Vertex is currently blocked.

Returns:
The boolean showing if this Vertex is blocked.

block

public void block()
Make this Vertex blocked.

unblock

public void unblock()
Make this Vertex free (unblocked).

setAlwaysFree

public void setAlwaysFree(boolean fin)
Make the always free status of this Vertex equal to the given input. True to be always free, False to allow to be blocked.

Parameters:
fin - The boolean representing the new always free state for this Vertex.

isAlwaysFree

public boolean isAlwaysFree()
Return true if this Vertex has its always free status set to true. This takes precedence over the setBlocked(), block() and unblock() methods.

Returns:
The boolean showing if this Vertex is always free.

setAlwaysBlocked

public void setAlwaysBlocked(boolean fin)
Make the always blocked status of this Vertex equal to the given input. True to be always blocked, False to allow to be free. This takes precedence over setAlwaysFree() and any other blocking/unblocking.

Parameters:
fin - The boolean representing the new always free state for this Vertex.

isAlwaysBlocked

public boolean isAlwaysBlocked()
Return true if this Vertex has its always blocked status set to true.

Returns:
The boolean showing if this Vertex is always blocked.

setBlocked

public void setBlocked(boolean statein)
Make the bocked status of this Vertex equal to the given input. True to block, False to unblock.

Parameters:
statein - The boolean representing the new blocked state for this Vertex.

addEdge

public void addEdge(Vertex vin)
Add a Vertex to the current list of Reachable Vertices from this Vertex.

Parameters:
vin - The Vertex to add to the current list of reachable Vertices.

addPathEdge

public void addPathEdge(Vertex vin)
Add a Vertex to the current path for this Vertex. This is required by the a* method in the Graph class.

Parameters:
vin - The Vertex to add to the current path.

Graph
